name: G - Universe Helios
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "G - Universe" Ritual Spell. Up to twice per turn, when this attacking card destroys a monster by battle: You can discard 1 Machine monster; this card can attack again in a row. If this card on the field is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "G - Universe Helios" once per Duel.
pendulum_text: When you activate this card: You can add 1 "G - Universe" Ritual Spell from the deck or GY to your hand. You can only use this effect once per turn. If you control no monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "G - Universe Helios" once per Duel.
